altTitles.en: Tougen Anki: Legend of the Cursed Blood

altTitles.fr: Tôgen Anki : La légende du sang maudit

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
description.fr:
Une légende raconte qu'un enfant extrêmement fort serait né d'une pêche et baptisé Momotarô. Lorsqu'il devint assez grand et puissant, ce valeureux guerrier aurait chassé les Oni qui pillaient les villages. Ce héros n'est pas une légende... Tout comme les Oni...
Leurs descendants sont encore parmi nous et la bataille opposait le clan Momotarô au clan des Oni fait rage ! Shiki est un jeune garçon, au sang chaud. Alors qu'il vient de se faire renvoyer de l'école, il prend conscience qu'il possède du sang de Oni. Le clan Momotarô le cherche et veut l'éliminer. la quête de liberté de Shiki et des autres Oni commence...
description.ja: 「お前は鬼の血を継いでいる……」　主人公・四季は自らの血に棲む者と出逢うことになる。
description.pt-br: Ichinose Shiki, um herdeiro do sangue de Oni, viveu toda a sua infância alheio a esse fato. No entanto, quando um homem desconhecido entra correndo em sua casa na tentativa de assassiná-lo, seu pai adotivo finalmente revela a verdade. Em um mundo onde Oni e Momotarou nunca puderam coexistir, junte-se a Ichinose em sua luta pelo poder e unificando as duas raças!

altTitles.en: The Maid Who Can't Hide Her Feelings (Serialization)

altTitles.ja: メイカさんは押しころせない

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Que Não Consegue Esconder Seus Sentimentos (Serialização)

altTitles.vi: Meika-san Không Thể Thổ Lộ Tình Cảm Của Cô Ấy

description.en: A serialization of the webcomic about a maid, Meika, who can't completely suppress her feelings for her master, Kouta.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện kể về một cô hầu gái, Meika, người không thể kìm nén hoàn toàn tình cảm của mình dành cho chủ nhân của cô ấy, Kouta.
description.es-la: Una serialización del webcomic sobre una maid, Meika, quien no puede reprimir por completo sus sentimientos por su amo, Kouta.
description.pt-br: A serialização da webcomic sobre uma empregada, Meika, que não consegue ocultar completamente seus sentimentos pelo seu mestre, Kouta.

title.en: Becoming the Queen at the Age of Six

description.en: I woke up to find myself transmigrated into a novel as the “background character that's doomed to die.” Now stuck in the body of a six-year-old, I’ve got some serious challenges ahead of me. But I’m not about to let fate have its way. Even if I have to become the villain, I’ll do whatever it takes to survive!
description.fr:
À mon réveil, j’ai découvert que j’avais été transportée dans un roman… sous les traits d’un simple personnage secondaire condamné à mourir.
Désormais prisonnière du corps d’une enfant de six ans, les épreuves s’annoncent nombreuses.
Mais il est hors de question que je me laisse faire par le destin.
Quitte à devenir une méchante, je survivrai, coûte que coûte.

altTitles.fr: Les anecdotes de la Shadows Draconis

description.fr: Salutations jeunes lecteurs et lectrices parvenus dans nos contrées par curiosité. Si certains parmi vous sauront de quoi je parle d'autres non. Alors allez lire "Akuyaku reijou no shitsuji sama drapeau hametsu wa ore ga tsubusasete itadakimasu" car ici n'est à lire que le concentré des chaps bonus pour les rares affamés, lecteurs de ces chapitres. Le spoil, c'est le mal. Alors gardez-vous si vous n'avez pas lu l'œuvre. (Comparer au reste des œuvres où l'on sort un chap par mois. Ici sera publié 1 chapitre tous les deux semaines) Bien à vous et bonne lecture

altTitles.fr: La présidente, l’alcool et les étoiles

altTitles.es-la: La Presidenta, El Alcohol y Las Estrellas

altTitles.pt-br: A Presidente, o Álcool e as Estrelas

description.en: Reina Izutsu (24) has just taken over as president of Izutsu Printing after the sudden passing of her father. Kenichi Ishizumi (37), a section chief at the company, worries about Reina, who's been coming down a bit too hard on the staff as she struggles to fill her father's shoes. One night, he runs into her at a park, drunk and frustrated, blurting out, "I can't take this anymore! I quit being the president!" Too tipsy to even recognize him as her subordinate, Reina lets her guard down, and under the stars, Ishizumi quietly vows to support her however he can.
description.fr:
Reina Izutsu, 24 ans, vient de reprendre la direction de l’imprimerie familiale après la disparition soudaine de son père. Mais endosser ce rôle n’a rien d’évident… et ses employés en font les frais.

Kenichi Ishizumi, 37 ans, chef de service discret et loyal, s’inquiète pour elle. Un soir, il la croise par hasard dans un parc. Ivre et à bout de nerfs, Reina explose : “J’en peux plus ! J’arrête d’être présidente !” Sans même réaliser qu’elle parle à un de ses subordonnés, elle se livre entièrement…

Sous les étoiles, une promesse silencieuse naît. Kenichi décide de la soutenir, peu importe ce qu’il en coûte.

Une comédie romantique douce-amère, entre patronne déboussolée et employé attentionné, à savourer avec un verre… et un cœur grand ouvert.
description.ja: 亡くなった先代社長の父の後を継いで、印刷会社・井筒印刷の若社長になった井筒玲奈(24)。係長の石墨憲一(37)は気を張るあまり社員達にキツくなりがちな玲奈を心配するが、夜の公園で酒を呷りながら「もう無理！ 社長やめる」と弱音を吐く彼女と接する。そして、泥酔のあまり部下の自分と気づかれないまま、彼女を支えようと星空の下で誓う…。KOWAI!? KAWAII‼
description.nl:
Reina Izutsu (24) staat plots aan het roer van Izutsu Printing na het onverwachte overlijden van haar vader. Vastbesloten om zijn nalatenschap voort te zetten, zet ze zich keihard in, misschien wel té hard. Haar strenge houding zorgt voor spanningen binnen het bedrijf, iets waar Kenichi Ishizumi (37), afdelingshoofd en trouwe werknemer, zich zorgen over maakt.

Op een avond treft hij Reina dronken en gefrustreerd in het park. “Ik stop ermee, ik wil geen president meer zijn!” roept ze uit, zich niet eens bewust van zijn aanwezigheid als ondergeschikte. In dat kwetsbare moment ziet Ishizumi een andere kant van haar, en onder de sterren besluit hij haar vanaf dat moment onvoorwaardelijk te steunen.
description.pt-br: Reina Izutsu (24) acaba de assumir a presidência da Izutsu Printing após o falecimento repentino de seu pai. Kenichi Ishizumi (37), chefe de seção da empresa, preocupa-se com Reina, que tem sido um pouco dura demais com a equipe enquanto luta para substituir o pai. Certa noite, ele a encontra em um parque, bêbado e frustrado, e grita: "Não aguento mais! Desisto de ser presidente!". Embriagada demais para sequer reconhecê-lo como seu subordinado, Reina baixa a guarda e, sob as estrelas, Ishizumi jura discretamente apoiá-la no que puder.

altTitles.th: หนึ่งคำมั่น นิรันดร์

altTitles.ja: あの日の誓いを果たすために

description.ar:
كان الامير الثالث "جينغ شاو" منتصر في الحرب و كان دائمآ محاط بعدد لا يحصي من الجميلات .. ومع ذلك لقد تم توريطه والايقاع به عن طريق الخطأ وخسر كل شئ.  
وعلي الرغم من ذلك كان الشخص الوحيد الذي تبعه هو خليلة الذكر الغير مفضل الذي اهمله لسنين…… بعد تناسخه، قرر "جينغ شاو" البدء من جديد و السعي خلف زوجه الذكر.   
وعلي الرغم من ذلك .. يبدو ان الامور لن تسير كما خطط لها، مطاردة الزوجه اصعب مما كان يظن
description.en: Third Prince Jing Shao was victorious in war and always surrounded by countless beauties. However, he was wrongly framed and lost everything. Yet the only person who followed him was the unfavoured male concubine that he neglected for years…… After his reincarnation, Jing Shao decided to start afresh and chase after his male wife. Although it seems things will not go as planned, chasing a wife is harder than he thought!
description.id:
Pangeran Ketiga Jing Shao menang dalam perang dan selalu dikelilingi oleh keindahan yang tak terhitung jumlahnya. Namun, dia dijebak dan kehilangan segalanya. Namun satu-satunya orang yang mengikutinya adalah istri laki-laki yang tidak disukai yang dia abaikan selama bertahun-tahun.

Setelah reinkarnasinya, Jing Shao memutuskan untuk memulai lagi dan mengejar istri prianya. Meskipun tampaknya semuanya tidak berjalan sesuai rencana, mengejar seorang istri lebih sulit dari yang dia kira!

title.en: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai

altTitles.ja: シャイなあの子に懐かれたい

altTitles.en: I Want to be Liked By that Shy Girl

altTitles.vi: Tôi muốn được cô nàng nhút nhát ấy để ý

description.en:
“*My seatmate, Shiraishi-san, is just too cute—and it's driving me crazy!*”

They know each other, but they’re not exactly friends. Akaogi Ayame and Shiraishi Konomi are classmates—*nothing more, nothing less.* Ayame is strikingly beautiful, a standout athlete, and popular in class, whilst Konomi is shy, introverted, and has only one friend. They should’ve had no reason to interact... so how did things end up this way? What started as a small, trivial incident caused Ayame’s hidden feelings to overflow, now she can’t stop thinking about *her!*
description.ja:
「隣の席の白石さんが、可愛すぎてつらい…！」

知り合いであって友だちじゃない。つまりはただのクラスメイトの、赤荻菖と白石このみ。美人でスポーツ万能、クラスでも目立っている菖、内気で人見知り、友だちも一人しかいないこのみ、接点なんてあるわけなかったはずなのに……？ささいなきっかけから秘めてた想いがあふれ出し、あの子のことで頭がいっぱい！
description.vi:
"Bạn cùng bàn của tôi, Shiraishi-san, đáng yêu quá mức… khiến tôi phát điên!"

Họ biết nhau, nhưng không hẳn là bạn bè. Akaogi Ayame và Shiraishi Konomi chỉ là bạn cùng lớp—không hơn, không kém. Ayame nổi bật với vẻ ngoài xinh đẹp, tài năng thể thao và được bạn bè yêu mến, trong khi Konomi lại nhút nhát, hướng nội và chỉ có một người bạn duy nhất. Họ vốn chẳng có lý do gì để tiếp xúc… vậy mà mọi chuyện lại thành ra thế này? Một sự việc nhỏ nhặt đã khiến những cảm xúc giấu kín của Ayame trào dâng, và giờ đây cô ấy không thể ngừng nghĩ về cô ấy!

altTitles.ja: セイレーンは君に歌わない

description.en:
Towa Takanashi is a descendent of Sirens and is infatuated with her classmate, Kei Shibuya. Torn between her feelings and the Siren's unique nature of yearning to eat the one they love, Towa musters up the courage to confess to him—only to get completely rejected on the spot! But what happens when she finds out Shibuya-kun's secret...?

(Source: MANGA Plus)
description.ja: セイレーンである正体を隠して暮らす少女・小鳥遊叶羽。彼女は同級生の渋谷圭に恋をしていたが、「愛する人を食べたくなる」セイレーンの性質に悩む日々を送っていた。そんな中、叶羽は勇気を出して告白するも呆気なく玉砕!? しかしそこから、渋谷君の秘密を知ることになって…。

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

altTitles.th: วันนี้ที่ระเบียง

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.fr: Après être mort de maladie à l'âge de 39 ans, Machio Hiraku se voit offrir la possibilité d'aller dans un autre monde. Lorsque Dieu lui demande quel est son souhait afin de lui donner plus de force, il réclame un corps en bonne santé. Pour son deuxième souhait, il choisit de vivre paisiblement, pour son troisième, de pouvoir connaître la langue locale, et pour son dernier souhait, de pouvoir devenir agriculteur.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**  

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3289ds/)
- [Official LN (JP)](http://www.fujimishobo.co.jp/sp/201803nonbiri/)
- [Alternative Raw](https://dragonage-comic.com/product/nonbiri_noka/)
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.
